name: Vocera Communications, Inc.
description: Vocera Communications, Inc. is a leading provider of healthcare communication solutions that enhance the way care teams connect and collaborate. Founded in 2000 and headquartered in San Jose, California, Vocera specializes in solutions that improve patient care and streamline workflows in hospitals and healthcare facilities. The company’s flagship product, the Vocera Smartbadge, is a wearable communication device that allows healthcare professionals to communicate instantly and securely, improving response times and patient safety. In addition to the Smartbadge, Vocera offers a robust software platform that integrates with existing healthcare systems, enabling real-time communication and data sharing across care teams. Vocera's solutions are designed to reduce noise and distractions in clinical environments, allowing healthcare providers to focus on delivering high-quality care. The company's mission is to transform healthcare communication to create a better experience for patients and staff alike. With a commitment to innovation and improving patient outcomes, Vocera continues to lead the way in healthcare communication technology.
